text: Ignacio Pichardo Pagaza (13 November 1935 - 14 April 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was Governor of the State of Mexico from 1989 to 1993. For a brief time in 1994, he was President of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Pichardo Pagaza was born in Toluca, State of Mexico, Mexico. Pichardo Pagaza died in Mexico City on 14 April 2020 from surgery-related problems, aged 84.Murió Ignacio Pichardo Pagaza, ex gobernador del Estado de México y ex secretario de Energía ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:People from Toluca Category:Governors of the State of Mexico
title: Ignacio Pichardo Pagaza
